column4: I am trying to upgrade ubuntu server from 10.10 to 11.04.  I ran aptitude install update-manager-core, and it installed fine, but do-release-upgrade isn't located anywhere!  Is there something else i must install?

I am trying to upgrade ubuntu server from 10.10 to 11.04.  I ran aptitude install update-manager-core, and it installed fine, but do-release-upgrade isn't located anywhere!  Is there something else i must install?
are you sure it's not located anywhere?  update-manager-core provides /usr/bin/do-release-upgrade
nope, its not there.   check it: http://pastebin.com/zcZs0gSD
